name: Deoriatal
description:
Chandrashilla Top is one of the enchanting peaks that offer the best panoramic view of the mighty Himalayas. Alongside the Himalayas, Chandrashilla Top also offers the captivating views of some of the other peaks of the Garhwali Himalayas.

This trekking trip will take the trekkers to some of the magnificent valleys, lush forests, flowering meadows and alpine peaks. Camps at different locations will add more delightfulness to this trekking sojourn. And in case, the trekkers wishes for more fun and excitement, an inclusion of white water rafting through the enraged rapids of Rishikesh will surely boost up their adrenalines.
